author: miriam
title: RAZ Finance: Decentralized Impact
description: 新一代的、更有意识的投资者希望得到真正的环境、社会和治理结果。自我报告的数据是不够的。

f6_assessments.q0: Wow! This is some next level thinking. The Misc Challenge is the right place for this proposal because it has so many angles and touches upon so many important topics. Therein lies the biggest weakness, too. Perhaps RAZ tries to be a little bit too many things at the same time (eCommerce platform for "good" products, stakeholder engagement network, due diligence tool etc). Regardless, this team is clearly going to create a multiplying positive impact via their multi-chain solutions. Eagerly following what lies ahead.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is amazingly impressive: a committed, diverse and experienced bunch of professionals who can achieve great things together. There are many features and functionalities in the current Worpdress site, perhaps even too many. I have a feeling that, if funded, quite soon this team is going to be joined by additional talent who are toing to make the UX/UI even more attractive. The upcoming IDO/ICO sounds exciting and this might well be one of those future success stories built on, but not limited to Cardano (loving the link to the Ocean Data Marketplace!).
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap, milestones, budget and deliverables are very detailed and easy to track. The team values transparency and is committed to report even their financials openly and publicly. Exceptional!

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem is within this challenge that cannot place on others. 
The proposal also tells about how the network will directly benefit Catalyst projects and teams, alongside Catalyst digitals and communities. Moreover, this will also help others projects in Cardano ecosystem. 
The proposal includes clear goals and KPIs in months that fit with the detailed plan.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal provided clear info for assessing the feasibility including: 
- Clear and detailed implementation plan to help understand the network activities and detailed impact of each object. 
- Good vision and goals for achieve 
- Clear info of people in the project and their role that all skillful to execute and support the project. 
- Deliverables on the success that shows strongly affect to Cardano ecosystem 
- Roadmap in the first 2 quarters of 2022 with a very detailed explanation about what they will do. 
- Reasonabe required-budget that fit with the plan and roadmap 
The only thing don't have here is some potential risks/difficulties that can be met in the future.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal provides a perfect roadmap with a sufficient timeline to the team and a clear timeline that helps the auditing progress easily to Catalyst community. 
It also shows a very detailed explanation of the problem and the solution that addresses it.

f6_assessments.q0: The surface goals of the RAZ product/proof of concept do align with the Cardano vision but the connection to Cardano seems non-committal in general. The deliverables lack technical detail that communicates an understanding of the nuances of Cardano integration. The proposal and attached/related information have the tone of an early funding round, which isn't a problem in itself, but for a Catalyst proposal I would like to see more technical details related to cardano integration, because these ties to Cardano have been included to make the project more relevant to Catalyst, whereas the external information related to RAZ seems blockchain agnostic. The dashboard for Catalyst proposals will only be of value once the project is in a mature state which seems very far off.
f6_assessments.q1: considering the broad scope and early stage of the project, I'm not confident in the ability of the team to achieve the stated goals. A more detailed technical roadmap, detailing the integration with Cardano and communication an understanding of the underlying technology required to achieve the blockchain related features (like proof of existence) and gamification of the platform would increase my confidence. As it is, I'm only confident that they will achieve the token sale.
f6_assessments.q2: The scope is very broad. The KPIs provided are far off and difficult to measure. 10k is dedicated to token minting and distribution which is not a costly procedure in itself. I give 2 stars instead of 1 because they propose to track the allocation of the catalyst funds on publicly on their platform, and because clear deliverables are listed, but they lack technical detail to audit sufficiently

solution: RAZ让利益相关者：员工、投资者、客户和社区参与进来，在激励成果的同时影响任务驱动的项目。
experience: 经认证的 "世界最佳 "B类公司 | ESG最佳实践 | 影响测量和管理 | 网站开发、营销和用户体验
